texts.value: Converts glutamate to gamma-aminobutyrate (GABA), consuming one intracellular proton in the reaction. The gad system helps to maintain a near-neutral intracellular pH when cells are exposed to extremely acidic conditions. The ability to survive transit through the acidic conditions of the stomach is essential for successful colonization of the mammalian host by commensal and pathogenic bacteria
Localized exclusively in the cytoplasm at neutral pH, but is recruited to the membrane when the pH falls

By acidic conditions. Expression is regulated by a complex system involving RpoS, cAMP, CRP, EvgAS, H-NS, GadE, GadW and GadX. The level of involvement for each regulator varies depending upon the growth phase and the medium
Changing Lys-276 to Ala increases thermal stability and protease resistance. The unfolding temperature is increased by 11 degrees Celsius
Belongs to the group II decarboxylase family

features.description: Strongly reduces pyridoxal phosphate binding and increases stability of the polypeptide.

citation.title: Escherichia coli has two homologous glutamate decarboxylase genes that map to distinct loci.
